sub_title: Process architect of Global Service Integration & Management
summary:
Simon is a co-creator with strong analytical skills. He likes to study trends in IT and industry standards to design better IT processes.

Areas of expertise: DevOps, DevSecOps, Enterprise Architecture (TOGAF), IT Compliance, IT4IT (Open Group), IT Service Management (ITIL), Service Integration and Management (SIAM).

Simon has 25 years of experience in IT.
His career steps in a nutshell: software tester, test manager, quality manager, IT compliance officer, SIAM process architect.

education.degree_name: Post Graduate Certificate in Chemistry Education

organizations.name: Randstad Groep Nederland
organizations.position: Servant Leader | Quality Manager | Scrum Master

courses.name: Basic skills for quality assurance and testing
Project Management D (compliant with IPMA D)

profile_positions.description:
Simon is responsible for the architecture of the end-to-end ITSM/SIAM processes.
He will co-create the ITSM processes with all stakeholders.

Randstad Global IT Services has the ambition to improve their IT Service Management (ITSM) to a CMMI Level 4 with all vendors based on the Service Integration and Management (SIAM) model.

The main goals of Simon's position are:
- architectural support for improving the current ITSM processes as defined in the contract between Randstad and their main integration partner, TCS.
- designing the architecture for the processes related to the SIAM model for Randstad Global IT Services
- onboarding of business services on the SIAM process architecture

The SIAM process architecture will be based on industry standards like:  ISO 20000, ITIL, IT4IT, ServiceNow CSDM and SIAM
profile_positions.title: Process architect of Global Service Integration & Management

profile_positions.description:
Randstad Groep Nederland has an ISO27001 certification.
Simon is responsible for the IT compliance regarding ISO controls which are related to SDLC.
He helps IT teams of Randstad Groep Nederland to become and stay compliant with the SDLC requirements. Simon also monitors the compliance and he initiates improvements together with the IT teams.
profile_positions.title: Compliance officer for Software Delivery Life Cycle management (SDLC)

profile_positions.description:
The most important assignment for the coming period:
- reviewing and improving the IT Compliance Framework (ICF) documentation
- Investigating whether the ICF can be accommodated in the "Governance, Risk and Compliance" (GRC) module of ServiceNow
- Requesting feedback from the end-user group for the IT Compliance Framework
- Investigating how we can better integrate the ICF with the wishes from the Risk & Compliance team of Randstad IT
profile_positions.title: Compliance Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The first half of the year 2022 was dominated by maintenance and management of the patch processes.
In the second half of 2022, together with the DevOps team and IT architecture team and IT teams, I will be investigating which DevSecOps tools we as Randstad Groep Netherlands want to purchase.
A Static Application Security Testing (SAST) tool and a Software Composition Analysis (SCA) tool have a high priority.
With the purchase of an SCA tool, the IT teams and the security test team can improve the scanning of open source libraries.
profile_positions.title: Patch manager

profile_positions.description:
As of October 2021, the maintenance of the IT Compliance Framework (ICF) has been assigned to the "Delivery & Process Support" team (DPS team). I was part of this team.

The ICF application and associated work processes were thoroughly revised during this period.
The main changes were:
- the confirmation that a business application was ISO compliant was now recorded via a compliance task with a workflow tool (Jira from Atlassian)
- the annual review to confirm that a business application was still ISO compliant, was now monitored by the lead Product Owner and a Compliance Officer
- the Jira and Confluence administration was further automated and monitored by the DPS team

Together with Kevin Achterberg I was responsible for the design, development and implementation of these improvements. All improvements were developed in Atlassian's Jira and Confluence tools.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Randstad Groep Nederland decided to be certified for ISO27001 in 2021.

As a patch manager I was responsible for recording the patch process according to ISO standards. In addition, the security officer instructed me to record the patch process for open source code libraries. And finally I was responsible for managing the patch processes established in 2020: AMI patching, database patching and standard application patching.

I have developed the patch approach for the code libraries together with Alfred Boersma (IT architect). Randstad Groep Nederland had no central tooling available for scanning and patching code libraries. The first version of the patch approach was therefore based on the maturity and the available tools within the IT teams. All IT teams had implemented the following steps, as far as possible:
- compiling and maintaining a list of used code libraries
- regular license review
- regular review of the versions
- regular patching if applicable

In December 2021, all ISO controls, including those of patch management, were approved by an external auditor and Randstad Groep Nederland obtained its ISO27001 certification.
profile_positions.title: Patch manager

profile_positions.description:
Randstad Groep Nederland wanted to obtain an ISO27001 certification in 2021 with the condition that the controls of ISO would be integrated with the agile and DevOps way of working within Randstad.
The chosen solution consisted of the following elements:
- the ISO controls for which the IT teams were responsible were divided into 11 compliance themes
- each compliance theme was led by a Control Responsible
- each theme consisted of a number of ISO requirements that were described in a documentation tool (Confluence from Atlassian)
- the confirmation that a business application was ISO compliant was documented per compliance theme in a documentation space per business application
- the annual review to confirm that a business application was still ISO compliant, was arranged with a review task for the Product Owners via a workflow tool (Jira from Atlassian)

This solution was called the IT Compliance Framework (ICF).

From design to implementation, we received continuous feedback from an end-user team representing all roles within the IT teams and from the Control Responsibles group.

Together with Bas Eizema I built the first version of the ICF and introduced it to the IT teams.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Randstad management decided based on an external audit that about 20 security and privacy processes needed to be improved.

As a patch manager I was responsible for translating the patch policy into an executable patch process. The starting point was that the patching of IT components was delegated to the IT teams of Randstad Groep Nederland.

I had described a standard patch process for 3 types of IT components and implemented it together with the IT teams:
- patching Amazon Machine Images (AMIs in an AWS cloud environment)
- patching databases
- patching purchased applications

For each type of IT component I had established an inventory, described a patch process, set up the patch monitoring and helped the IT teams to implement the process. The IT teams were responsible for patching their IT components.

I worked in the Cloud Infrastructure Services team. This was the DevOps team of Randstad Group Netherlands. My colleagues in the team supported the IT teams in automating the AMI patching.
profile_positions.title: Patch manager

profile_positions.description:
Migrating to Amazon Web Services together with new outsourcing partner

Randstad Holding wanted to make benefit of cloud computing and chose for Amazon Web Services (AWS) as cloud provider and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) as global partner for IT infrastructure. I became member of the team responsible to migrate the IT infrastructure to AWS. It was my role to be the Scrum Master and I was responsible for implementing new work processes.

My main contributions:
- redefining monitoring and incident process due to migrating to AWS and outsourcing responsibilities
- helping development teams getting useful system monitoring information from ApplicationsManager 
- defining a new change process for infrastructural changes executed by development teams
- defining an acceptance and release process for transition to AWS
-  improving Scrum with Kanban principles to create more flow in service requests and impediments
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master & Change agent

profile_positions.description:
Improving software delivery process

I was member of the Chapter Continuous Improvement. This Chapter was responsible for helping the IT teams with improving their software delivery processes. The main tasks of our Chapter were:
- providing and improving the continuous delivery framework for applications and infrastructure (GitLab, Jenkins, Puppet, Amazon Web Services)
- providing and improving the monitoring and alerting framework (Elastic-Logstash-Kibana from Elastic and Application Manager from ManageEngine)
- improving development and testing practices
- extended development team membership to maintain and innovate middleware and infrastructure

My main contributions:
- Leading a Proof of Concept to select a test automation tool for OutSystems applications
- Leading the discussion to create a new approach for test data management
- Implementing an ELK based alerting tool for alerting development teams when application limits are reached
- Leadinng the creation of an integrated IT change process between local Randstad organization and the new Randstad global IT infrastructure organization
- Providing a standard deployment process with CAB pre-approvals for standard software deployments
- Providing JIRA consultancy: creating new workflows, training new teams, upgrading JIRA
profile_positions.title: Quality Manager

profile_positions.description:
Implementation Agile tooling

I was project manager for implementing JIRA from Atlassian for Randstad IT.
The implementation was executed by Prepend, an Atlassian consultancy company.
Each team was consulted about their way of working and the JIRA configuration had been tailored to the preferences of the development teams. All development teams of Randstad IT got their JIRA projects and training to make a start with using JIRA.
Finaly we created a JIRA support team at Randstad IT to help development teams with JIRA in the future. I became member of this JIRA support team.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Lead 2 development teams in their agile journey.

I was servant leader of 2 development teams responsible for web service integration and web services development to support several business applications.

As member of the Randstad IT management team  I focused on these goals:
- a management transition towards servant leadership by the management team
- an improvement of the Scrum way of working by development teams
- learning about resource management, team & personal coaching
profile_positions.title: Servant leader

profile_positions.description:
I-bridge was the IT service center of Randstad Groep Nederland, specialized in solutions in the field of flexible work and HR services. 
I-bridge delivered and maintained the IT for the 3 brands of Randstad Groep Nederland: Randstad, Tempo Team and Yacht. 
I was team manager of the software testers and responsible for the Quality Assurance of the software delivery process.
profile_positions.title: Manager QA & Test

profile_positions.description:
I was fully assigned to Rabobank during my career at Bartosz.

Besides this assignment I was member of an special interest group for exploring  the role of quality producer (Dutch: "kwaliteits regiseur"). Organizing  end-to-end quality in complex environments.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager

profile_positions.description:
Test manager for migrating several bank accounttypes to the new CRM Siebel application and phasing out the old bank account administration.

My contributions to this project:
- creating a test approach
- responsible for test automation
- responsible for functional testing,  performance testing and security testing
- a good performing team of 9 testers

Last half year I was Scrum Master of the improvement team of  Service & Koop program. This team steered the  continuous improvements regarding the first steps on the Agile journey and on working with the Scrum framework.
For me this was the first opportunity to learn what Agile and Scrum means for software delivery and software quality.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager | Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for two IT process chains of KPN. 
1: financial month end closing chain
2: bill presentment and collections chain
IT Operations and business defined Key Performance Indicators and agreed a service improvement plan. Because of my effort the month end closing chain became more stable and predictable. For the bill presentment and collections chain I extended the incident management proces to the end-to-end chain and improved the understanding between business and IT processes. The last half year I focussed on the transition of the operations activities to a managed service partner in India.
profile_positions.title: Business Chain Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the quality policy within the KPN Channels program.
The Channels program steered the innovations for the front end web sites of KPN: www.kpn.com, www.hi.nl and www.kpnvandaag.nl.

Improvements I was responsible for:
- implementing of project quality reviews
- implementing test automation
- improving the outsourcing of test activities to an Indian consultancy company
- coordinating the migration to KPN-RUP way of working: Use Case implementation,  standard release management and requirements management
- improving the test environments for standard release management
- investigation on multi-browser  testing
profile_positions.title: Quality Manager

profile_positions.description:
Connecting external Telco service providers

Connecting the mobile network of external Telco service providers with the KPN mobile network.
This could be done by connecting the mobile network administrations of external Telco's with the KPN mobile network administration.

I was responsible to organize the integration tests together with the IT department of the external service providers.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager

profile_positions.description: I worked at Sogeti Nederland B.V. as test manager. During these years I worked as consultant for Nationale Nederlanden, Quion and KPN. Beside these test management jobs, I was chairman of Sogeti's expertise group for Testing Service Oriented Architecture.
profile_positions.title: Test manager

profile_positions.title: Test Consultant | Test Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Implementationof Siebel CRM pakket for Sales Business Market

Technology stack
Siebel CRM configuration and new customer database coupled by a new Enterprise Service Bus.

My contributions:

profile_positions.title: Test manager

Migration of Oracle Finance & Logistics

Technology Stack
Integration of  4 Oracle Finance and Logistics configurations to one central configurations with 100+ interfaces to other systems and a data migration from 4 databases to 1 central database.

My contributions:
- providing a master test plan and detail test plans

profile_positions.title: Test manager

profile_positions.description:
Renewal mortgage  backoffice application.

Technology stack:
Java application with service oriented architecture

I was test manager for a project to renew the mortgage backoffice application. I created a test plan and formed a  test team with 6 testers for the functional acceptance test. I was responsible for planning, progress and organizing the user acceptance test.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager

profile_positions.description:
Renewal life assurance administration

Technology stack:
J2EE application in a complex architecture with 100+ XML interfaces and a WebSphere MQ service bus.

Business context:
New mortgage application for 200 end users and migrating 150k insurancy policies.

I was test manager for a release of the new life assurance administration. I led a test team of 16 testers and I managed the functional acceptance test, user acceptance test, chain integration test,  actuarial test, conversion test and performance test.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager
